explains: adj. 恶意的，恶毒的，怀恨的
wordGroup: malicious damage 蓄意损害所造成的损失

sentences.en: That might merely have been malicious gossip.
These are not necessarily hateful, malicious people.
sentences.cn: 这些不一定是心怀怨恨、有恶意的人。

sentences.en: It was malicious gossip, completely without substance.
sentences.cn: 这是恶意造谣，完全没有事实根据。
